title: Find Familiar
content:
Find Familiar Level 1 Conjuration Spell Summon a familiar, a fey spirit that takes an animal form of your choosing. 18m Action Level 1 Spell Slot

Level 1 Conjuration Spell

Summon a familiar, a fey spirit that takes an animal form of your choosing.

Find Familiar is a Spell in Baldur's Gate 3. Find Familiar is a Lvl 1 Spell from the Conjuration school. Spells can be used for dealing damage to Enemies, inflict Status Ailments, buff Characters or interact with the environment.

Find Familiar Information

Description: Gain the service of a familiar, a fey spirit that takes an animal form of your choosing: Find Familiar: Spider Summon spider familiar. Its deadly bite can poison enemies. Find Familiar: Raven Summon a raven familiar. It can launch precise attacks. Find Familiar: Frog Summon a frog familiar. Its skin is covered with dizzying toxins. Find Familiar: Cat Summon a cat familiar. Its meow can distract your enemies. Find Familiar: Crab Summon a crab familiar. Its sharp pincers can slow enemies. Find Familiar: Rat Summon a rat familiar. Its infectious bite can spread disease. Find Familiar: Scratch Any character with Scratch's Ball can summon Scratch. Scratch will automatically be dismissed if his summoner returns to camp. Level: Lvl 1 spell School: Conjuration School Casting Time: Action Range: 18m Requires Concentration: No Saving Throw: None Ritual Spell: Yes

How to Acquire Find Familiar

Find Familiar can be acquired by the following classes:

Wizard Ranger Eldritch Knight (Fighter) Arcane Trickster (Rogue) Warlock Pact of the Chain Pact Boon

Find Familiar can be cast by using the following Items:

Scroll of Summon Quasit

Find Familiar Tips & Notes

Any character with Scratch's Ball can summon Scratch. Scratch will automatically be dismissed if his summoner returns to camp. Find Familiar is a ritual spell which can be cast without expending a spell slot outside combat. Rangers, at creation (level 1), can choose one of the five available Natural Explorer features called Beast Tamer. An invisible familiar can safely be placed next to an enemy to give the caster Advantage on Attack Rolls against it.
